ceo.name: Sohail Mirza
ceo.title: CEO & Founder
ceo.bio: With over 15 years of experience in international trade and business development, Sohail Mirza founded Global Trade California with a vision to bridge markets across continents. His expertise in supply chain management, strategic partnerships, and cross-cultural business operations has positioned GTC as a trusted leader in global trading solutions.
ceo.quote: Success in global trade isn't just about moving productsâ€”it's about building lasting relationships and creating value for communities worldwide.
ceo.education: MBA in International Business, Stanford University
ceo.experience: 15+ years in international trade and logistics
